Class I18n

The I18n service is a minimal internal singleton service used to supply our components with translated strings.

All the components that support I18n also support directly passed strings. Usage of I18n is optional, and it is not recommended for application use (libraries like ngx-translate are a better choice)

Methods

get

  • get(path?: string): any
    • Defined in src/i18n/i18n.service.ts:208

    When a path is specified returns an observable that will resolve to the translation string value.

    Returns the full translations object if path is not specified.

    Parameters

    • Optional path: string

      optional, looks like "NOTIFICATION.CLOSE_BUTTON"

    Returns any

getLocale

  • getLocale(): string
    • Defined in src/i18n/i18n.service.ts:176

    Returns the current locale

    Returns string

getLocaleObservable

  • getLocaleObservable(): Observable<string>
    • Defined in src/i18n/i18n.service.ts:183

    Returns an observable that resolves to the current locale, and will update when changed

    Returns Observable<string>

getMultiple

  • getMultiple(partialPath: string): object
    • Defined in src/i18n/i18n.service.ts:220

    Returns all descendents of some path fragment as an object.

    Parameters

    • partialPath: string

      a path fragment, for example "NOTIFICATION"

    Returns object

    • [key: string]: Observable<string>

getOverridable

  • getOverridable(path: string): Overridable
    • Defined in src/i18n/i18n.service.ts:237

    Returns an instance of Overridable that can be used to optionally override the value provided by I18n

    Parameters

    • path: string

      looks like "NOTIFICATION.CLOSE_BUTTON"

    Returns Overridable

    • Defined in src/i18n/i18n.service.ts:267

    Trys to resolve a value from the provided path.

      looks like "NOTIFICATION.CLOSE_BUTTON"

    Returns string | object

replace

  • replace(subject: Observable<string>, variables: object): any
    • Defined in src/i18n/i18n.service.ts:258

    Takes the Observable returned from i18n.get and an object of variables to replace.

    The keys specify the variable name in the string.

    Example:

    service.set({ "TEST": "{{foo}} {{bar}}" });

service.replace(service.get("TEST"), { foo: "test", bar: "asdf" })

    Produces: "test asdf"

    Parameters

    • subject: Observable<string>

      the translation to replace variables on

    • variables: object

      object of variables to replace

      • [key: string]: string

    Returns any

set

  • set(strings: TranslationStrings): void
    • Defined in src/i18n/i18n.service.ts:192

    Set/update the translations from an object. Also notifies all participating components of the update.

    Parameters

    • strings: TranslationStrings

      an object of strings, should follow the same format as src/i18n/en.json

    Returns void

setLocale

  • setLocale(language: string, strings?: TranslationStrings): void
    • Defined in src/i18n/i18n.service.ts:166

    Sets the locale and optionally the translation strings. Locale is used by components that are already locale aware (datepicker for example) while the translation strings are used for components that are not.

    Locales set here will override locales/languages set in components

    Parameters

    • language: string

      an ISO 639-1 language code - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes

    • Optional strings: TranslationStrings

      an object of strings, optional

    Returns void
